00040             class FASTRPC_DllAPI ServerTransport : public Transport
00041             {
00042                 typedef size_t (*ServerTransport_Callback)(eprosima::rpc::protocol::Protocol&, void*&, size_t&, size_t&, Endpoint*);
00043 
00044                 public:
00045 
00047                     ServerTransport() : m_strategy(NULL), m_protocol(NULL), m_callback(NULL)
00048                     {}
00049 
00051                     virtual ~ServerTransport(){}
00052 
00057                     inline
00058                         void setStrategy(eprosima::rpc::strategy::ServerStrategy &strategy)
00059                         {
00060                             m_strategy = &strategy;
00061                         }
00062 
00067                     inline
00068                         void linkProtocol(eprosima::rpc::protocol::Protocol &protocol)
00069                         {
00070                             m_protocol = &protocol;
00071                         }
00072 
00077                     inline
00078                         eprosima::rpc::protocol::Protocol& getLinkedProtocol()
00079                         {
00080                             return *m_protocol;
00081                         }
00082 
00087                     inline
00088                         eprosima::rpc::strategy::ServerStrategy& getStrategy() const
00089                         {
00090                             return *m_strategy;
00091                         }
00092 
00097                     inline
00098                         ServerTransport_Callback getCallback() const
00099                         {
00100                             return m_callback;
00101                         }
00102 
00107                     void setCallback(ServerTransport_Callback callback)
00108                     {
00109                         m_callback = callback;
00110                     }
00111 
00116                     TransportBehaviour getBehaviour() const
00117                     {
00118                         return SERVER_BEHAVIOUR;
00119                     }
00120 
00125                     virtual const char* getType() const = 0;
00126 
00130                     virtual void run() = 0;
00131 
00135                     virtual void stop() = 0;
00136 
00143                     virtual void sendReply(void *data, size_t dataLength, Endpoint *endpoint) = 0;
00144 
00152                     virtual int receive(char *buffer, size_t bufferLength, size_t &dataToRead, Endpoint *endpoint) = 0; 
00153
